meanings.definition: To detach or release from a fixed position or value.
meanings.sent1: She unpegged the clothes from the line.
meanings.sent2: The currency was unpegged from the US dollar.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel unpegged all the tent stakes for fun.
meanings.sent4: Her determination unpegged her from the constraints of self-doubt.
meanings.sent5: With a swift motion, he unpegged the painting from the wall.

meanings.definition: Not fixed or restricted in value or position.
meanings.sent1: The unpegged currency fluctuated in value.
meanings.sent2: Her unpegged hair flowed freely in the wind.
meanings.sent3: The unpegged balloon soared high above the trees.
meanings.sent4: His unpegged creativity knew no bounds.
meanings.sent5: The unpegged boat drifted aimlessly on the lake.
